CHAT.comment: videotape does not start until later; transcript until then is solely from audio

Chi plays with the objects while Mot watches. Mot is silent for much of the activity and Chi seems to set her own agenda while Mot makes occasional suggestions. There is little science talk during the activity- at the beginning of the activity Mot asks Chi a few questions about which objects don't stick to the black base.

u.a: talks about camera
video begins here
MOT and Chi are seated next to one another at table; magnets are set up on the table in front of them; the black base is empty and the magnets are in a pile nearby
touches plastic teddy bear
touches green turtle
picks up horseshoe magnet and sticks it to black base; picks it up and moves it around then leaves it on base in an upright position
sticks two silver sticks on the base so that they hang off the edge
attempts to stand a silver man on one of the silver sticks
clears objects off black base
places several nuts on the black base
takes nuts off black base
picks up silver circle from table and puts it on black base
tries to push silver circle across black base so it is centered
stands three silver men in a circle on the silver circle on the black base; places silver sticks across their shoulders
uses yellow wand to pick up objects from the table; adds two more silver men to the circle on the black base

g.ga: silver man in center of circle

u.a: places a washer around the neck of a silver man
muttered
places washers on the ends of the silver sticks that the silver men are holding
sighs
places a paper clip at the edge of the construction on the silver circle
places a paper clip at the edge of the construction on her side
places paper clip on black base so that it hangs off the edge of the silver circle
attempts to do what Chi just did but her paper clip sticks to the side of the black base
picks up blue arrow magnet and holds it over the construction so that the arrow points down at the circle of men
picks up white magnet ball and balances it on the head of the silver man in the center of the circle
attempts to put red magnet ball on top of white one Mot has just placed
<$=2> red magnet ball
lets go of magnet ball; it stays for a second and then tips over taking the white ball with it
whispered
attempts to put the white magnet ball back on the silver man in the center of the black base
holds horseshoe magnet over the white ball in the center of the black base
holds yellow wand over the white ball; it picks the ball up
clears ball off yellow wand and holds wand over silver sticks on the black base
the yellow wand pulls the silver stick and one of the silver men off the black base
sweeps yellow wand across black base clearing off all the objects
clears objects off yellow wand
sticks a silver man on the silver circle; then knocks him with her hand
takes silver man off black base
puts a silver stick flat on the edge of the silver circle; puts another silver stick flat on the other side of the silver circle
places nuts on the silver circle so that there is one at each corner
puts yellow and white checked triangle on the black base
places a magnet ball next to each of the nuts on the black base
very quietly
whispered
places paper clips around the edge of the black base
places a washer on the edge of the black base
puts another paper clip on the edge of the black base
MOT
slides black base slightly toward Mot
stands blue arrow magnet in the center of the black base with the arrow pointing up
lifts the arrow up and puts it back down
places a silver man on top of the blue arrow magnet on the black base
adds more silver men to the construction
paper clip
places a paper clip on top of the silver man that is on top of the blue arrow magnet
picks up something and replaces it on black base
several of the objects in Chi's construction have fallen over on the base and she is attempting to fix them
Chi has fixed construction
